1.3.name: wordpress/holy-quran-random-ayahs
1.3.description:
This plugin will allow you to display Random Quran verses along with its translation and audio in a widget

To get started quickly, just enable the plugin and then enable the widget - That's it!

Any questions?

  • Visit http://www.webgalli.com/blog/random-specific-daily-quran-ayah-plugins-for-elgg-and-wordpress/
